attributes.action: keep parking meters off Eastern Parade and St Helens Parade, Southsea
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Portsmouth City Council wants to raise cash from visitors by introducing parking meters on to Eastern Parade and St Helens Parade, Southsea. However there is absolutely nothing to stop anyone parking on any of the nearby residential sidestreets. This could lead to parking chaos.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
